# Review Investment Portfolio

Monthly review of investment accounts and rebalancing if needed.

## Checklist
- [ ] Check 401(k) performance
- [ ] Review stock allocations
- [ ] Assess bond portfolio
- [ ] Update spreadsheet
- [ ] Consider rebalancing

**Frequency:** Monthly
**Next Review:** March 1, 2026
